      • run

        public void run()
        指定者:
        run 在接口中 Runnable

      • start

        private void start()
        Initialize the Task by 1st setting the current state to starting indicating the initialization procedure.
        Moving on the underlying MongoCursor gets #, Class) created and is health checked. Once a valid MongoCursor is created the state is set to running. If the health check is not passed the MongoCursor is immediately closed and a new MongoCursor is requested until a valid one is retrieved or the state changes.

      • isLongLived

        public boolean isLongLived()
        从接口复制的说明: SchedulingAwareRunnable
        Return whether the Runnable's operation is long-lived (true) versus short-lived (false).

        In the former case, the task will not allocate a thread from the thread pool (if any) but rather be considered as long-running background thread.

        This should be considered a hint. Of course TaskExecutor implementations are free to ignore this flag and the SchedulingAwareRunnable interface overall.

        指定者:
        isLongLived 在接口中 SchedulingAwareRunnable

      • awaitStart

        public boolean awaitStart(Duration timeout)
                   throws InterruptedException
        从接口复制的说明: Task
        Synchronous, blocking call that awaits until this Task becomes active.
        指定者:
        awaitStart 在接口中 Task
        参数:
        timeout - must not be null.
        返回:
        true if the task was started. false if the waiting time elapsed before task was started.
        抛出:
        InterruptedException - if the current thread is interrupted while waiting.

      • execute

        private <V> V execute(Supplier<V> callback)
        Execute an operation and take care of translating exceptions using the rethrowing the potentially translated exception.
        类型参数:
        V -
        参数:
        callback - must not be null.
        返回:
        can be null.
        抛出:
        RuntimeException - The potentially translated exception.
